attributes.review: after downloading this app i found that i was exposed to racist, homophobic and sexist content🧚🏼 absolutely awful do not recommend🤮 also please stop messing with gen Z u will get nowhere😊 and do not try take tik tok away from us thank you😇
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app reminded me of how racist and homophobic this rapist really is. The fact that this man has children in cages made me cry then I had a panic attack. He himself is overwhelming and I cried when I saw his dp or should I say didn’t bc that was nonexistent to be truly honest...
attributes.title: This caused me actual pain

attributes.review: This app is the most fagliest stuff I’ve ever seen. Very slow!! So complicated and it offended me :( take this up down nowwww!! Most Horrible app I’ve ever downloaded in my whole entire life . I do not recommend this at ALL DONT GET ITSSS HORRIBLE 😭😭😭😢😢😢😢😢😢😭😭😭😭😤😠😩😩😩😠😤😤😭😢😢😢😭😤😠😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😠😤😭😭😢😭

attributes.review: Awful app. When i tried to look up what war crimes the president and his team have committed nothing came up. This is absolutely a travesty. I expected a full portfolio of all his finest work!! Very disappointing.
attributes.title: 0/10 stars

attributes.review: I wish I could give it 0 stars. This app is extremely glitchy. It crashes too frequently and it ate up all of my storage.
attributes.title: This app takes up way too much space!

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app (which took like 2000 days btw), my phone at first started to smell like fresh oranges. And I was like ooooo, but then after like 10 mins, it smelled like it was ROTTING!! THIS APP TURNED MY PHONE INTO A ROTTING ORANGE!!!!!! THIS App is awful!! I will need to report back to the manager of this app 🙄🙄🙄
attributes.title: This app stinks

attributes.review: This app was horrible! I just found out that it looked into all of my data and then sent it to China!!! I can’t believe that my presidents app would do that to me... I’m such a disappointed customer.
attributes.title: Worst mistake ever.

attributes.review: This app is so horrible As soon as a download it stole my burrito and ran over me with a hot dog Stand I am now in the emergency room not looking so hot...dog anyways if you want to keep your burritos and not get ran over by hot dog stands VOTE BERNIE I-wait wrong one we miss you though😔...VOTE BIDEN and keep your burritos close.🌯
attributes.title: PLEASE BE CAREFUL BEFORE ENTERING

attributes.review: Quite simply the worst app I’ve ever had—the worst app in American history! It glitches, it slows down my phone, it’s a piece of garbage and I had to delete it so quickly just to get my life back on track!
attributes.title: Garbage App

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it immediately asked for personal information that was not necessary. I am very disappointed in this app and not to mention it crashed several times.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!! 😤😤
